metadata.name: Racing+ Rebalanced
metadata.description:
[h1][b]Racing+ Rebalanced A rebalancing mod for The Binding of Isaac: Afterbirth+[/b][/h1]
What is this mod? Read the documentation here: https://github.com/Zamiell/racing_plus_rebalanced/blob/main/CHANGES.md
For technical support or general questions, please [b]do not post a comment here[/b]. Instead, post in the Racing+ general chat on the Isaac racing & speedrunning Discord server: https://discord.gg/JzbhWQb
